title: Catacomba di San Giovanni
description: Ancient catacombs in the city of Siracusa, built between AD 315 and 360. The main gallery re-purposes parts of an earlier aqueduct.

properties.description: Representative location of the Catacombe di San Giovanni, in Siracusa, based on a node derived from OpenStreetMap.
properties.title: OSM location of the Catacombe di San Giovanni
